author: _shemnon
content:
<@211091239112671234> <@360491619402776577> What are your thoughts on updating EIP-3155 for tracing EOF Frames? I see two main options
   (a) Finalize EIP-3155 and create a new EIP to cover tracing for EOF, that includes and references 3155, or 
  (b) update EIP-3155 to include EOF needed features (add `section`, and `returnStack` for code CALLF support and `immediage` for ops with immediate args)

author: _shemnon
content: I can do (b) if you were to add me to the authors list.
